title: Conversion Mechanism - Valuation-Based Conversion Mechanism
description: Sets forth inputs and conversion mechanism based on valuations (with potential discounts)

conversion_discount.description: What is the percentage discount available upon conversion, if applicable? (decimal representation - e.g. 0.125 for 12.5%)

conversion_valuation_cap.description: What is the valuation cap (if applicable)?

conversion_timing.description: Should the conversion amount be based on pre or post money capitalization

capitalization_definition.description: How is company capitalization defined for purposes of conversion? If possible, include the legal language from the instrument.

capitalization_definition_rules.description: The rules for which types of securities would be included in the capitalization definition.
